17 5 turn single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in next 2 chains 9 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet slip_stitch in last st chain 1= 17 6 turn 2 single_crochet increase 14 single_crochet= 22 7 chain 1 turn 9 single_crochet work 6 single_crochet in the same st 8 single_crochet f/o and leave a long tail for sewing sweet oddity art 5 assembly head and body 1 pin the head and body together 2 sew the head onto the body you may need to add more stuffing as you sew horns 1 pin the horns onto the top of the head 2 sew the horns onto the head sweet oddity art 6 ears 1 pinch the ears together at the bottom of the ear sew together about 3 stitches to create a closed look 2 pin the ears next to the horns 3 sew the ears onto the head sweet oddity art 7 arms 1 pin the arms onto the side of the body approximately between rounds 22 and 23 2 sew the arms onto the body tail 1 pin the tail onto the back of the body 2 sew the tail onto the body sweet oddity art 8 wings 1 pin the wings onto the back of the body 2 sew the wings onto the body you have your finished dragon thank you for your purchase if you have any questions or concerns please email me at sweetoddityart@gmail com or etsy convo me i will get back to you asap please share your finished dragon with me as often as you want i love seeing them sweet oddity art 9 helpful tips exact colors
